scantree =
    'index.html': true
    'blog':
        'post1.md': true
        'post2.md': true
    'styles':
        'style.css': true
        'themes':
            'balupton':
                'style.css': true
            'style.css': true

  ¶



Test rmdir

        		
        
                describe 'rmdir', ->

        		
      

      

        


  ¶



Cleaup srcPath

        		
        
                  it 'should clean up the srcPath', (done) ->
                    balUtil.rmdir srcPath, (err) ->
                      throw err  if err
                      exists = path.existsSync(srcPath)
                      assert.equal(exists,false)
                      done()

        		
      

      

        


  ¶



Cleanup outPath

        		
        
                  it 'should clean up the outPath', (done) ->
                    balUtil.rmdir outPath, (err) ->
                      throw err  if err
                      exists = path.existsSync(outPath)
                      assert.equal(exists,false)
                      done()
